name: Starter Unreal Prototypes
description:
Simple Prototypes

Two simple prototypes. This was the first introduction to Unreal and Blueprints at Futuregames and they were both made in about a day. The first one was a collaboration and the second one I made myself.

We made this!

One day Prototypes is a student project made in 1 day each at Futuregames Higher Vocational Educations in Stockholm, Sweden. I made the first one together with Aldo Sartori and the second myself. These games were made February 2020 in Unreal Engine 4.
